engine.core

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.core.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    An object in the game.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(float minX,
      float minY,
      float maxX,
      float maxY)
        Creates a new Entity with minimum necessary construction.
        Parameters:
        minX - Smallest X value of the entity
        minY - Smallest Y value of the entity
        maxX - Biggest X value of the entity
        maxY - Biggest Y value of the entity

    • Method Detail

      • getComponent

        public EntityComponent getComponent(java.lang.String name)
        Finds and returns a component attached to this entity by name. If more than one is found, the first component in the list is returned. If none are found, returns null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the component to look for.
        Returns:
        The attached component with the name, or null if none exists.

      • add

        public Entity add(EntityComponent component)
        Adds a new component to the entity.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to add.
        Returns:
        this, to allow easily adding multiple components.

      • updateAABB

        public void updateAABB()
        Creates a new AABB for the object based on it's position.

        This should not be called if this entity is in an acceleration structure, like a QuadTree, or it will break the acceleration structure.

        Instead, only call this method if the entity has moved and it is certain this entity is no longer in any acceleration structure.

      • update

        public void update(Input input,
          float delta)
        Updates all the components attached to this entity.
        Parameters:
        input - User input to be processed
        delta - How much time has passed since the last update.

      • render

        public void render(RenderContext target)
        Renders all the components attached to this entity.
        Parameters:
        target - Where the components are rendered to.

      • intersectAABB

        public boolean intersectAABB(Entity other)
        Calculates whether this Entity's AABB is intersecting another's AABB.
        Parameters:
        other - The entity to test intersection against.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this Entity is intersecting the other Entity.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Entity r)
        Compares this entity to another, and returns which comes first based on render layer. Higher render layers should be drawn first.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Entity>

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Gets the X Position of this entity
        Returns:
        The X Position of this entity

      • getY

        public float getY()
        Gets the Y Position of this entity
        Returns:
        The Y Position of this entity

      • getAABB

        public AABB getAABB()
        Gets the bounding box of this entity.
        Returns:
        The AABB bounding this entity

      • setX

        public void setX(float x)
        Sets this entity's X position to a new value.
        Parameters:
        x - The new X position of the Entity

      • setY

        public void setY(float y)
        Sets this entity's Y position to a new value.
        Parameters:
        y - The new Y position of the Entity

      • setRenderLayer

        public void setRenderLayer(float layer)
        Sets this entity's render layer to a new value.
        Parameters:
        layer - The new render layer of the Entity. Higher values are drawn first.
